timeline.title: User Login Event
timeline.summary: Renee West (renee.west@lamronba.com) logged into her devices from San Francisco

timeline.title: User Login Event
timeline.summary: Renee West (renee.west@lamronba.com) logged into her devices from Hong Kong

timeline.title: Risk Event: Impossible Travel to Atypical Locations
timeline.subtitle: O365 Risk Event
timeline.summary: Renee West (renee.west@lamronba.com) logged into her devices from Hong Kong
timeline.alert: Renee West was briefly logged in from both San Francisco and Hong Kong within hours of each instance, which is unusual

timeline.title: Mail Rule Change
timeline.label: Trigger Event
timeline.summary: Renee West (renee.west@lamronba.com) created a mail rule to move messages from Zachary Newton (zachary.newton@lamronba.com) and Josh Waters (josh.waters@lamronba.com) to Junk Folder
timeline.alert: Renee West has never previously created rules to move messages from Accounts Payable. Attackers frequently use such Mail Rules to conceal activity from the account's true owner

timeline.title: Alert: Possible Email Account Compromise
timeline.label: Abnormal Alert
timeline.summary: Abnormal believes that Renee West (renee.west@lamronba.com)'s email account is potentially compromised. Abnormal has alerted soc@company.com

timeline.title: Email Correspondence
timeline.summary: Renee West (renee.west@lamronba.com) send an email to Zachary Newton (zachary.newton@lamronba.com) and Josh Waters (josh.waters@lamronba.com) titled 'Orion Limited Invoice'. This email was removed from Renee's mailbox by the suspicious mail rule
timeline.alert: 'Orion Limited Invoice' contains sensitive financial information. It's unusual for correspondence with financial invoices to be removed from employee mailboxes by mail rules

timeline.title: User Login Event
timeline.subtitle: O365 Logging API
timeline.summary: Renee West (renee.west@lamronba.com) logged into her devices from Hong Kong.
